mapper.insert: insert into album_info(album_id, title, price, content, band_id, register_date, image_name, file_name) values(#{album_id}, #{title}, #{price}, #{content}, #{band_id}, #{register_date}, #{image_name}, #{file_name})
insert into albumbbs_info(writing_id, writer_id, album_id, band_id) values(#{writing_id}, #{writer_id}, #{album_id}, #{band_id})
mapper.select: select * from albumbbs_info where band_id = #{band_id} order by writing_id desc
select a.* from album_info a, albumbbs_info b where a.album_id = b.album_id and a.band_id = #{band_id} order by b.writing_id desc
select table_name, last_id from id_sequence where table_name=#{table_name}
mapper.update: update id_sequence set last_id=#{last_id} where table_name=#{table_name}
